item.description:
Become a Certified Laughter Yoga Leader!!!

Becoming a leader is great for anyone who wants to:

TEACH LAUGHTER YOGA CLASSES OR 
RUN A LAUGHTER CLUB

REDUCE STRESS IN THEIR LIFE

BE A PART OF THE 
MAINE LAUGHTER YOGA TEAM

OR

LEARN HOW TO CREATE A PRACTICE OF LAUGHTER IN 
YOUR OWN LIFE

April 30-May 1st Saturday and Sunday 9-4pm
Intructor: Katie West, The Levity Coach 
$295.00 
(bring a friend 2 for $500.00)

Scholarships available upon request

Upon Completion of 2 day course, you receive a certification 
as a Laughter Yoga Leader from the Kataria School of Laughter Yoga 
TO REGISTER OR TO LEARN MORE: www.thelevityinstitute.com See Laughter Yoga Leader under rainings

EMAIL: Katie(at)thelevitycoach(dot)com 
PHONE: 207 -239-8667
item.how_to_find_us: Corner of India and Newbury Streets
item.why:
BECOME A CERTIFIED LAUGHTER YOGA LEADER in Portland, Maine on April 30-May 1st!
And celebrate World Laughter Day in downtown Portland as part of your training!
item.name: APRIL 30-MAY 1st--CERTIFIED LAUGHTER YOGA LEADER TRAINING w The Levity Institute
